website_summaries.verdict: The Rolls-Royce of strollers. Design and construction quality separate it from the rest of the pack.
cons: Not suited for rough terrain or inclement weather

customer_reviews.title: Honest submission
customer_reviews.text: $1200 for a stroller and car seat is a lot of money. I bought it purely for the name lol. It’s a good stroller but it’s a stroller. If you want to be noticed and be a bit snotty. This is your stroller.
customer_reviews.author: James Davis

customer_reviews.title: Defective Foot Brake
customer_reviews.text: After doing research on a stroller that would work for a surburan family, we decided to purchase the 2018 Uppababy Vista with Pram. Unfortunately, the foot brake is defective and we are unable to use this stroller and consider this is a major safety issue. The company is willing to replace the main part,but not replace the entire stroller. At this price point, I would expect better manufacturing and there are many videos now on you tube pointing out the defective brakes. I hope the company is able to make changes to improve their brakes, as we were overalled pleased with the manuverabiltiy and size of the pram.
customer_reviews.author: Customer Review

customer_reviews.title: Smooth ride and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I looked at strollers, read about them, and talked to other moms for a few months before making the decision to buy this one. I've used it for a while now and I love it. The basket on the bottom is HUGE and it rolls so smoothly I can control it with one hand. Folding and unfolding it is a breeze. I'm 5' 3" and my husband is 6' 3" and we can both push it comfortably thanks to the adjustable handle. I can't recommend this stroller highly enough! Update: I've been using this stroller for a while now and I still love it. It still steers and rolls so smoothly, and it's easy to wipe clean!
customer_reviews.author: M. Swaims

customer_reviews.title: Real color not matching pictures!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Vista 2018 Emmet. It looks in all catalog pictures as green color. After unboxing I couldn't believe my eyes - it was very very very grey color with a tiny hint of green. We contacted customer support but they didnt offer any solution and just confirmed this is indeed the Emmet green because THE TEXT IS GREEN. And blamed that pictures never show real color correctly. Compare the photos attached yourself. For such an expensive brand I expected better customer service and very precise matching between real color and the advertisement photos.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but needs some help
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look of this stroller. However, the more I use it the more I regret it. Once folded it is impossible to pick it up without pinching yourself since there is not a good place to hold it. Super bulky and even heavier when the toddler seat is on it. If you are attaching an uppababy Mesa car seat, it is really difficult to align it in order to snap into place. Not exactly easy to hold up baby while trying to snap it on. The seat and the bassinet both teeter once snapped on.
customer_reviews.author: Connor Parker

customer_reviews.title: Careful to not break the brake!
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller when it works, but the brake broke on mine out of warranty. There's a little metal pin that retracts and is framed in plastic. Well the plastic support broke, which meant the pin wasn't secure. So now the brake doesn't work. And when you're out of warranty that's a $220 part.
customer_reviews.author: Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Good stroller for new family.
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly smooth to push around. The quality is very good and study. Only draw back I noticed is there are no shock absorber on the back wheels, making it hard on bumps.
customer_reviews.author: Denzil Khine

customer_reviews.title: Bentley of strollers
customer_reviews.text: This really is the Bentley of strollers. It’s a bit on the heavy side, but #1 I am a smaller lady (5’2) and #2 it proves it’s quality. It’s super easy to use, whether you’re attaching the car seat or basinet. It also helps that this stroller is very sleek and classy looking. The price tag is a little steep, but I can definitely see this lasting multiple kids. (Not a sponsored ad, just really love my stroller)
customer_reviews.author: BriGee

customer_reviews.title: The stroller is high-quality screams luxury it is super comfortable and fits our needs is a small family ...
customer_reviews.text: The stroller is high-quality screams luxury it is super comfortable and fits our needs is a small family and my baby looks gorgeous in it I couldn’t ask for more functional and utilitarian stroller I feel like it is worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: michael lukacina

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: We love this stroller. It's so easy to maneuver. While it's not super easy to get it in and out of the car, it's comparable to other full-size strollers. The biggest highlight for us has been the bassinet. We thought we wouldn't use it at all (even looked to by the Vista without the bassinet) but, now that baby is here, we use it all the time. It's so nice not to have to strap the baby into the carseat just to go for a walk; we can just place him in the bassinet. We use it for naps occasionally and plan to use it for travel too. It's been great!
customer_reviews.author: jjschmitt

customer_reviews.title: Avoid Peg Preggo car seats w/ this stroller
customer_reviews.text: The Vista with the Pef Preggo adaptor and car seat doesn't work very well. Car seat rocks way to much. Poor latch/lock design on the Vista and poor adaptor by Pef Preggo adding to the problem. We love the car seat, just ordered the Bugaboo Fox and that combination works nicely. We wanted to love the Vista, beautiful leathet handle and large basket, but to many flaws for us
customer_reviews.author: M. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Must Have For New Parents!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for my husband's god-daughter who was having her first baby. Her and her husband absolutely love the stroller and all the many things it can do. They have used the portable bed part since day one and love it; the baby sleeps great in it! Taking walks with the stroller is so easy and being able to add on for a second baby when needed will make this stroller well worth the price for all the use you can get out of it for years to come. So glad I purchased it for them!
customer_reviews.author: Grace A.

customer_reviews.title: Love this stroller
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money in my opinion. So far we've been able to use all the features. The bassinet was a life saver for the first few weeks after we brought the baby home. The quality is amazing. Prior to getting it I was already planning to use it for my second baby in the future so I'm seeing it as an investment.
customer_reviews.author: Indre

customer_reviews.title: So glad I splurged
customer_reviews.text: I had fallen in love with this stroller since before getting pregnant. Husband was not a fan of the price and we did not have a Buy Buy Baby close to us but with Amazon baby registry (completion discount) , it became just a little more affordable and was shipped and delivered sooner than expected. I love the black on black. Rides smooth, holds big basket and looks super elegant. Can’t wait to have my baby riding in style now.
customer_reviews.author: Damaris Montalvo

customer_reviews.title: best baby purchase
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a baby stroller, look no further. This is the one you need to purchase. the wheels move around like butter and makes going around with baby easier. Got the Vista and like that the carseat and bassinet can also attach to the stroller. Currently with an infant, it's nice to be able to attach the carseat to the stroller and allow baby to continue sleeping while we run errands or eat. Investment worth making.
customer_reviews.author: min2be

customer_reviews.title: Leather handle for baby is bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller except its heavy weight. But yesterday I found my son bite the leather handle in front of him. And the leather has been bitten into small pieces, what Terrible it is! The tiny leather pieces was in his mouth everywhere and I assume he had swallowed some before I noticed it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny luk

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: We own and love the Minu which is great as an umbrella style stoller, however, We were looking for something more heavy duty. This stroller is gorgeous, it’s going to be absolutely perfect for us. I love that we can grow into it.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy this thing is to drive. It turns so easily and can take curbs and bumps pretty easily. The only dislikes are the back wheels are set farther apart than the front wheels which I often forget and they run into stuff (I imagine this will happen less as I get accustomed to it) and there's no easy way to carry it once it's folded. Other than that, this set has been worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: KY

customer_reviews.title: Large, fancy, smooth, with a build quality to match its price.
customer_reviews.text: If you're in the market for a large stroller, then you can't beat the Uppababy Vista. Keep in mind this is a large stroller with a wide wheel track and loads of storage on the bottom. Easy to put together, easy to fold, and with its large wheels goes everywhere. Comes with bassinet, bug Nets for the bassinet and babyseat (sold separately) and also comes with rain covers for bassinet and baby seat. Stroller is lightweight considering it's size. Can also be expanded to a double stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Arn Fontez

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love the vista. We were hesitant to spend so much on a stroller but the comfy bassinet attachment ultimately sold me and I convinced my husband to splurge. It has been worth every penny we paid for it. The look and feel of it is amazing. The Uppababy customer service is also amazing. I broke the lock latch and they replaced the whole frame. If you're on the fence...go for it, it'll be well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrica

customer_reviews.title: Soooo smooth
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this stroller. Totally obsessed. At first I purchased the City Select Lux, which is a little bulkier but seemed to be a good choice... until I had to fold it, and it drove me UP THE WALL. I immediately returned it and bought this one, and I’ve been addicted since. Such a comfy ride, genuinely a pleasure to push around. I look for opportunities just to use the stroller, as opposed to putting baby in a shopping cart or walking. It’s a little heavy, but it folds so easy, the ride is incomparable, and the options are endless. The under basket is wonderful, too. You can take everything you need and more.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Expect more for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It’s good but would expect more for paying an arm and a leg. It’s sturdy, looks great, very smooth. But for some strange reason the bassinet lacks any safety belts or buckles. Also if you plan to use both bassinet and toddler seat at the same time, the only configuration possible is to have the toddler seat higher, facing you and bassinet lower. Which is not exactly safe since most parents would prefer to have the bassinet higher and closer to the person pushing and the toddler seat lower and preferably facing out.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful stroller. I waited to leave a review because I wanted to review after my grandchild was born. This stroller is stunning in person and can be used like a stroller or even like an old fashion carriage. Easy to manipulate. I am amazed at the ease of the wheels rolling and turning...a really smooth ride.
customer_reviews.author: Molmag

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous well made
customer_reviews.text: Babe isn’t here yet but this is a beautiful, study stroller. I am particularly happy that we can just use the bassinet right away for her main spot to sleep. The color is pretty and unique and is a grey/green. someone commented its more grey which I definitely disagree with, it’s definiteky green. If anything it’s a sage like color.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Arrived beautiful and perfect
customer_reviews.text: Arrived beautiful and perfect! I had the Uppababy Cruz for my first baby and LOVED it. I plan on using this as a double. Its a little bigger and heavier than the Cruz, but it turns like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: frankiewonders

customer_reviews.title: Best investment for stress free travel
customer_reviews.text: I was very anti this stroller, almost $1,000 is insane right? Wrong. Best registry item we ever decided to do. This stroller and the uppa Mesa car seat are the only way to go. So easy to use and maneuver, turns on a dime. Definitely the way to go, especially if you think you will have two in a stroller at any point.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Brosch

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment if you like convenience
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the money, so easy to use and so many great features. Currently using the bassinet with my newborn and the piggyback board for my 3 year old. The only thing I don’t like is the foot break because my 3 year old knows how to lock and unlock it which scares me. I wish there was a hand break.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Love this stroller!
customer_reviews.text: I spent so many hours researching and test-driving strollers before deciding on the Uppababy Vista. I considered the UB Cruz but preferred the extended capabilities and larger bottom basket of the UB Vista. It was the lightest stroller of all I researched, drives so smooth, and is compatible with the Nuna Pipa infant car seat (with an adapter.) The bassinet is a perfect addition for neighborhood strolls.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Glam Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Quality, easy to use, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I am just impressed with this product. The quality is evident in every part of this stroller. The simple design easy to pop open and easy to fold down. The assembly by myself took under 5 minutes and required zero tools. This stroller is clearly built to last and I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Bei

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stroller!
customer_reviews.text: Can you be in love with a stroller? Love my uppababy stroller. We have the entire travel system. So easy to assemble, amazing quality, will last to convert to double stroller when we have baby #2. I live in Florida so the bug and rain shield are ideal for neighborhood strolls. Worth every dollar spent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful stroller, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful stroller. Pricey but I can tell the quality above the other brands. I wish all/most components were included, must buy them all separately. But honestly. Still a great stroller. The Denny color stands out and I get a lot of compliments when I’m out with my babies.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, perfect stroller
customer_reviews.text: We get so many compliments on this stroller, both in looks and how easy it is to maneuver. There's also a certain camaraderie when you see other parents out with their Vistas - because we both know how awesome they are. Seriously, this is the perfect stroller. Wish it was lighter and wish it was easier to engage the clip when you fold it up, but I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: gobigorange86

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: We had an older version of the Vista before this. We liked that one too. This 2018 model is close to perfect. Big improvement over an already strong previous product. Much easier to collapse now; generally seems lighter while still sturdy. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: L. Meier

customer_reviews.title: No complaints!
customer_reviews.text: While a bit more expensive then most strollers, well worth the money. Very durable and easy to clean. We liked how the car seat was easily able to move from car to stroller - took off a star as accessories and any new parts are pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY
customer_reviews.text: There’s really no cons about this I mean there’s just pros I mean I love the stroller it’s the perfect color I love the leather accents on the stroller and also on the belly bar I mean this is the best color I’ve ever gotten and this is definitely going to serve me years and years and years of use and thanks to Bambi baby I’m definitely going to buy from them again
customer_reviews.author: Rose Greenberg

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! So glad I invested the money into this travel system. Easy to use and great quality! The henry color is precious for our little guy. Stroller is a little heavier than I expected, but will take it for the excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: lkee

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking & maneuverable
customer_reviews.text: My wife & I got this for our little squirt and really like it. I was a bit skeptical since reaally, who wants to spend that much on a stroller? But yea its totally worth it (I did get in on sale). Its light & when you have the seat in there (not the bassinet) it easily fits in the trunk of my sedan. Plus the green color I got is nice to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Marcellus Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Best stroller on the market!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to ensemble and use. Light weight enough that someone petite like myself can pick up. Adjustable handle to accommodate various heights. No adapters with UppaBaby Mesa car seat which makes it so easy to switch from bassinet to car seat or toddler seat.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Colvard

customer_reviews.title: Buy this stroller
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller. Worth the cost 100%. Smooth ride, looks good and has the bassinet attachment that adds to its versatility. Easy to put together, took less than 10 minutes. Missing the zip on bassinet cover but I am getting with support to get that taken care of. Will recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: darci

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this stroller. Just had our second baby and originally we had the Chico Keyfit 360 stroller. This stroller is easy to maneuver, light weight, convenient for multiple kids, and I love having multiple ways to seat the babies. The stroller comes with the bassinet and the seat, you’ll have to buy the rumble seat separately which also comes with the lower adapters.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! The body is so light and easy to fold to put in and out of the car on trips. I also love the bassinet it’s large and easy to fold and place in trunk with the stroller. I haven’t yet used rumble seat but so far I’m a huge fan. Just be aware that if you place the bassinet on it can be hard to get large items underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Deutsch

customer_reviews.title: Very expensive, all accessories sold separately.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful stroller. However it does not have a handle to pick it up once you fold it down. It can also be problematic to release the latch to unfold. All accessories are sold separately therefore cost a lot more than one may want to spend.
customer_reviews.author: Yaquetta McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, very easy to set up, feels great when you push it. Still have to buy tons of add one though, the toddler seat that comes with it only goes up top, you need to buy a separate toddler seat for the bottom. Which is fine, just adds up. But the quality is amazing, much better then other strollers we’ve had!
customer_reviews.author: Quinn Padgett

customer_reviews.title: Premium Stroller
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to beat on this stroller. If you’re on the fence whether to purchase the Uppababy or a different stroller, pick this one! It’s extremely light weight, easy to maneuver, easy to fold and handle. The fact that the stroller looks good just an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Daniella

customer_reviews.title: Great Strolller
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son and daughter in law and they put it together quickly. They said it was easy to assemble great quality, easy to disassemble and love it over all.
customer_reviews.author: Elsa Maskell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I love the brand Uppababy and am very happy with the Vista. The color William is gender neutral and stunning in person. The handle is also leather in a navy blue color instead of brown. The only con to this brand is having to buy separate parts for everything. For the price, it should come standard. I’m very happy with the sale price and glad it arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla V

customer_reviews.title: Good stroller
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it is to push and put together. It fits our family perfectly. I don’t like you have to pay extra for all these attachments and seats, also I don’t like for how expensive it is how easily it scratches. I had 2 scratches the first few days I owned it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Open Box
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product after seeing the description on ‘open box-like new’ the product was not in good condition. Scratches all over the stroller and then covered up with what seemed permanent marker scribbles all over. I ordered car seat the same day and the description was ‘open box like new’ so I went ahead and purchased and that was truly like new. I was extremely disappointed in the strollers condition.
customer_reviews.author: tanairy guevara

customer_reviews.title: Easy and high quality with great maneuverability!
customer_reviews.text: Im very happy with my Uppa baby stroller. I purchased it in Henry Blue and couldn’t be more happier with it. I love the maneuverability as well as the ease of attaching it to and from the car seat and stroller base. Stylish product with lots of storage underneath. Top quality product that I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brok

customer_reviews.title: Good stroller but faulty
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I’m happy with the stroller but I feel like I was given a faulty product. The first issue I had was unbuckling they toddler seat seatbelt to put my toddler in, it was stuck and I had to keep fidgiting with it until it finally came undone... the second big issue I’m having with it is installing the toddler seat to separate uppa baby adapters. It’s not going in even though the correct ones were purchased. I’m so frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Nikolay Y.

customer_reviews.title: If you don't mind spending the money, get this!
customer_reviews.text: The price is about as high as you can spend on a stroller / car seat system but UPPA know what they are doing. Everything is easy to use and the build quality is great. They even look good which is a nice plus.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller system is the best! It didn’t think we would end up using the bassinet as much as we do with our newborn. Easy to travel with too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with it
customer_reviews.text: The stroller is super light weight and easy to maneuver; the turning radius is fantastic! The only thing we don’t like is that there’s no really good place to hold it from when folded, but other than that we are really glad with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CADILLAC OF STROLLERS
customer_reviews.text: The CADILLAC if strollers. So many ways to use this stroller. Even can double for two kids. Comfortable, ease of use, bassinet, car seat, etc. Included. Rain visor, sun visor, etc!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia Mauro

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: The stroller is a bit heavy when folding and I accidentally pinched myself. But overall love that it has all the pieces. So didn’t need 20 additional attachments. The best part is the bassinet which I have the stroller set up in my house and baby sleeps in it in different rooms which I love since her night time bassinet doesn’t move from our room.
customer_reviews.author: XXXXXX

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this stroller for our newborn. Everything is super easy to clip in and out and fold. Love the bassinet for when we are home and take a stroll around the lake. Baby loves it too! So glad we made the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie C

customer_reviews.title: In LOVE with this stroller. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I am completely obsessed with this stroller! I adore the color for boy or girl. It is so easy to fold and put in car. It rides so smooth and you look like a million bucks pushing it (even when i am in sweatpants with my hair a mess haha mom life!)
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I was cautious about spending so much for stroller but it really is great. Lightweight, handles amazing. Can easily maneuver one handed, must have for parents with more than one kid (you know what I'm talking about). Love the versatility of swapping out bassinet and adapter for car seat (purchased separately).
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Segarra

customer_reviews.title: Light weight yet sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller! It’s light and I love that it comes with a bassinet. We bought the bassinet stand and put it besides our bed. I also love that the stand can also convert to a laundry hamper.
customer_reviews.author: One Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it and so worth the money:) Really light weight and easy to maneuver. Currently using it for newborn. Very easy functions
customer_reviews.author: Kristin M.

customer_reviews.title: A great stroller
customer_reviews.text: So worth the money! Love this stroller! It’s very easy to use, snap on a car seat, a bassinet or a rumble seat. The frame is heavy but at the same time that’s where durability comes from.
customer_reviews.author: K Pa

customer_reviews.title: Good but has glitches
customer_reviews.text: For the most part it’s a good stroller but we’ve been using it for 4 months and the lock/unlock foot peddle stopped working. It won’t unlock unless I shake the stroller (baby is not in it of course) until it unsticks. It’s possible I just got a defective model. Otherwise, it’s aesthetically pleasing and has pretty good suspension.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for growing family!
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality, Not bulky, Easy to fold. Great investment for your family, can hold up to 3 kids!
customer_reviews.author: Ify Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Such a great stroller, it’s totally worth the price !! Super easy to use and great to navigate.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Carver

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful stroller
customer_reviews.text: We love this stroller. We bought it because we know we want a second child and this stroller can accommodate 2. Additionally the bassinet is where our baby sleeps so it is one less thing to store and buy. It drives extremely smoothly and turns very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: You can find a better stroller for less money. It’s not very convenient to fold up and once folded it doesn’t seem very secure. The metal is already quite scratched up and I’ve only had the carriage for a short time. It looks good, that’s a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor G

customer_reviews.title: Best stroller on the market
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller, well worth the money. The only thing that isn’t so great is how heavy it is but that comes with the quality of the materials used and durability of the product
customer_reviews.author: jordan white

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive, but very easy to use, sleek and stylish, expandable and smooth to push.
customer_reviews.author: I’m just here so I don’t get fined

customer_reviews.title: You need to order extra parts to make it work for both kids.
customer_reviews.text: I am very surprised/disappointed how hard it is to turn the stroller when I have both kids in it, and how i have di take some of it apart to fold. For the price that shouldn't be an issue I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Bessette

customer_reviews.title: Shower GIft
customer_reviews.text: 2nd UPPAbaby stroller brought for a niece. Very easy to put together and get around, For the price it is definitely the best product to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Dream stroller
customer_reviews.text: I love looking at it. It’s so easy to collapse and is pretty compact collapsed with the seat attached! It comes with all the accessories such as the rain and mosquito covers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smooth ride!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2! One for each of my Grandaughters...love this stroller!
customer_reviews.author: S. Burbelo

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Stroller!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing stroller! Moves well and the bassinet is lovely. So excited to use this when our baby boy arrives!
customer_reviews.author: SWreviews

customer_reviews.title: Opened box!
customer_reviews.text: The box was opened and a part was broken when arrived.. i think someone got into the box beforehand because i can’t see a company oking what went out. Otherwise looked like a great stroller
customer_reviews.author: irainel mata

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Stroller is worth every penny! Our son has slight jaundice, so we have been walking him in the neighborhood in the bassinet. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a high quality stroller, very cool looking and super versatile. I love the storage too!
customer_reviews.author: Jo C

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy, my daughter loved the bassinet it was cozy and she could lay in it and nap. The stroller is super easy to push. It’s a “smooth” ride.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: 2018 UPPAbaby VISTA Stroller, Jake (Black/Carbon/Black Leather)
product_meta.description: Color:Black/Carbon/Leather| Style:JakeWith more than a dozen configurations, the versatile UPPAbaby VISTA transforms into any stroller you need it to be, whether you're strolling with a single child, siblings or twins. Start with one child in a bassinet, infant car seat, or the Toddler Seat she'll use until she no longer needs a stroller. When your family grows, add a second seat—and even a glider board to take a third child along for the ride. Robust suspension in the VISTA frame and wheels provide smooth handling over uneven terrain, while a one-step, standing fold makes for convenient entries and exits during errands. The VISTA offers a reversible seat, a height-adjustable canopy, a near-flat recline, and tons of storage space. No wonder it's one of the most popular strollers on the market. Dimensions: Unfolded: 36 x 25.7 x 39.5 inches , Folded with seat attached : 17.3 x 25.7 x 33 inches , Folded without seat attached : 16.8 x 25.7 x 33 inches . Weight recommendation : Bassinet suitable from birth , up to 20 pounds or until infant can push up on hands and knees , whichever comes first. Toddler Seat suitable from 3 months to 50 pounds
feature_bullets: Includes bassinet, full size front or rear facing toddler seat with multi-position recline, toddler seat rain and bug shields, and bassinet bug shield and storage bag

Compatible with MESA Infant Car Seat - direct attachment, no adapters necessary; Compatible with select Chicco and Maxi-Cosi infant car seats when using adaptors (car seats and adaptors sold separately)
Longer bassinet mattress pad with ventilation for added breathability
One-step fold with or without seat attached
Extendable sun canopy with SPF 50+ visor
X-Large, easy-access basket holds up to 30lbs
Dimensions Unfolded(LxWxH): 36" x 25.7" x 39.5". Folded with seat attached: 17.3" x 25.7" x 33". Folded without seat attached: 16.8" x 25.7" x 33"
